title: Want to contribute, but starts from where?
CssClassNames
description: cssClassNames can be used inside ui feature to apply extra css classes other than the css classes which are already applied in the ui-component. cssClassNames can be applied statically or conditionally based on your requirements.

title: Description
description: description can be used inside ui binding to display description for the particular formControl in the dynamic-form. description can be generated statically or conditionally based on your requirements.

title: Disabled
description: disable can be used inside ui binding to disable the particular control object in the dynamic-form.

title: Power of Dynamic Forms
description: rxweb dynamic forms is giving wide variety of features wich include horizontal forms, inline form, customized sizing for formControls, customized controls like plaintext mode for checkbox, radio and other formcontrols.

title: DynamicComponent
description: override Props is used to override the property based upon the server returned configuration.

title: Disable
description: disable can be used inside ui feature to disable the particular formControl in the dynamic-form. You can disable a formControl statically or conditionally based on your requirements.

title: DynamicFormConfiguration
description: DynamicFormConfiguration

title: Focus
description: focus can be used inside ui binding to set focus on particular control object in the dynamic-form.

title: Hide
description: hide can be used inside ui bindings to hide the particular control object in the dynamic-form.

title: Label
description: label can be used inside ui binding to generate a label in the dynamic-form.

title: OverrideProps
description: override Props is used to override the property based upon the server returned configuration.

title: Placeholder
description: placeholder can be used inside ui binding to display placeholder for the particular control object in the dynamic-form.

title: Readonly
description: readonly can be used inside ui binding to convert the particular control object in readonly state in your dynamic-form.

title: Source
description: source can be used inside ui binding to bind the sourcedata in the particular formControl in your dynamic-form.

title: Value
description: value property can be used in the serverData to set a default value for particular control object.

title: Description
description: description can be used inside ui binding to display description for the particular formControl in the dynamic-form. description can be generated statically or conditionally based on your requirements.

title: Disabled
description: disable can be used inside ui binding to disable the particular control object in the dynamic-form.

title: Focus
description: focus can be used inside ui binding to set focus on particular control object in the dynamic-form.

title: Hide
description: hide can be used inside ui bindings to hide the particular control object in the dynamic-form.

title: Label
description: label can be used inside ui binding to generate a label in the dynamic-form.

title: Placeholder
description: placeholder can be used inside ui binding to display placeholder for the particular control object in the dynamic-form.

title: Readonly
description: readonly can be used inside ui binding to convert the particular control object in readonly state in your dynamic-form.

title: Source
description: source can be used inside ui binding to bind the sourcedata in the particular formControl in your dynamic-form.

title: Value

title: Best way to show error messages
Post as FormData of Reactive Form value
Use multiple validations using logical operators.
Update data only changed column value
FormBuilderConfiguration
description: FormBuilderConfiguration is used to create object property instance and array property instance through dynamic configuration in your formGroup.

title: Disabled Control Conditionally
description: It is used for disabled control conditionally

title: Apply a class conditionally to the form control element
prop
description: It is used to define a property of a field in the model class.

title: propArray
description: PropArray is used to define an array of the instances of a class.

title: propObject
description: It is used to define an object of thes property of a field in the model class.

title: Conditional Validation
description: Conditional validation is used when the user wants to apply validation on the field depending upon the condition of some other field

title: AllOf
description: allOf validationwill check whether the user has entered all of the values of given field or not.

title: Alpha
description: Alpha validationwill allow only alphabets to be entered. It will not allow any digit or special character.

title: AlphaNumeric
description: Alpha Numeric validationwill allow only alphabets and numbers to be entered. It will not allow any special character.

title: Ascii
description: ascii validationallows user to enter the input which is in the proper ascii format.

title: Async
description: Async validationwill allow the field to validate the unique value from server for that particular field. This async validation can be customized according to the need.

title: Choice
description: choice validationwill check that whether the value entered by user is matching the range defined in the properties.

title: Compare
description: Compare validation  will compare two inputs whether they are same or not.

title: Compose
description: Compose validationis used to apply multiple validations on a particular formControl.

title: Contains
description: Contains validationwill check whether a particular value is in the input. It will not allow user to enter input that does not contains the predefined value.

title: CreditCard
description: creditCard validationwill check property value is creditcardtype or not. It will not allow to enter any value other than credit card format.

title: Cusip
description: CUSIP validationwill allow user to enter only nine-character alpha-numeric cusip code. CUSIP numbers are used to identify North-American finantial securities.

title: DataUri
description: dataUri validationallows user to enter the input which is a valid data Uri format.

title: Date
description: Date validationwill allow user to enter input which is only in the proper date format.

title: Different
description: Different validationwill check two inputs whether they are different or not. It is just opposite of different decorator.

title: Digit
description: Digit validationwill allow only digits to be entered, It will not allow any alphabets or special character.

title: Email
description: Email validationwill only allow user to enter input which is in the correct email format.

title: EndsWith
description: endsWith validationallows user to validate the input which ends with particular value.

title: Even
description: Even validationwill check whether the value entered by user is an even number or not.

title: Extension
description: extension validationallows user to validate the input which is in the proper extension format.

title: Factor
description: factor validationwill allow user to enter valid factor of a number which is called dividend.

title: File
description: file validationallows user to validate whether how many files can be uploaded. It depends on maxFiles and minFiles.

title: FileSize
description: fileSize validationallows user to enter the input which is in the proper fileSize size format.

title: GreaterThan
description: Greater than validationwill check that user's input is greater than related field input.

title: GreaterThanEqualTo
description: Greater than equal to validation  will check that input property is greater than or equal to the related field input.

title: GRid
description: GRid validation will allow user to enter only the input in proper GRid format.The Global Release Identifier (GRid) is a system to identify releases of digital sound recordings (and other digital data) for electronic distribution.A GRid consists of 18 alphanumerical characters.

title: HexColor
description: HexColor validation  will allow user to enter only the input in proper Hex Color format.

title: Image
description: image validation  allows user to validate image like height,width etc.

title: Ip
description: ip validationis used to validate the ip address of the device.

title: Latitude
description: latitude validation  allows user to enter value which is valid latitude.

title: LatLong
description: latLong validation  allows user to enter the input which is valid Latitude or longitude.

title: LeapYear
description: LeapYear validation  will check whether the value entered is a leap year or not.

title: LessThan
description: Less than validation  will allow the user to enter only that value which is less than the value in the pre defined field.

title: LessThanEqualTo
description: Less than equal to validationwill allow the user to enter only that value which is less than or equal to the value in the pre defined field.

title: Longitude
description: longitude validation  allows user to enter the input which is in the proper longitude format.

title: LowerCase
description: lowerCase validation  will allow user to enter only the lowercase alphabets.

title: Mac
description: mac validation  will check whether the value entered is a valid mac address.

title: MaxDate
description: MaxDate validation  will allow user to enter the date less than the maxDate value parameter.

title: MaxLength
description: MaxLength validation  will allow user to enter the input upto the maximum length value parameter.

title: MaxNumber
description: MaxNumber validation  will allow user to enter the input upto the maximum number value parameter.

title: MaxTime
description: maxTime validation  will allow user to enter the input time format which must be less than or equal to the maximum time mentioned in the config parameters.

title: MinDate
description: Minimum Date validation  will allow user to enter date greater the minimum date value parameter.

title: MinLength
description: MinLength validation  will allow user to enter the input length matching the minimum length value parameter.

title: MinNumber
description: MinNumber validation  will allow user to enter the input greater than the minimum number value parameter.

title: MinTime
description: minTime validationwill allow user to enter the input time format which must be strictly greater than or greater than or equal to the minimum time mentioned in the config parameters.

title: NoneOf
description: noneOf validation  will check whether the none of the values is selected from the given inputs.

title: NotEmpty
description: notEmpty validation  will check whether the value entered by the user is not empty, It will not allow white space.

title: Numeric
description: numeric validation  will check whether the value entered is a valid numberic value or not.The validation can be set according to requirement, it can be either decimal,negative number or positive number.

title: Odd
description: Odd validationwill check whether the value entered is an odd number or not.

title: OneOf
description: oneOf validation  will check whether the user has entered any one of the given inputs or not.

title: Password
description: Password validation  will allow user to enter only the input according to correct password validation format.

title: Pattern
description: Pattern validationwill allow user to enter the input which match the predefined pattern value parameter.

title: Port
description: port validation  allows user to enter the input which is a valid port number.

title: PrimeNumber
description: primeNumber validation  allows user to enter only prime number.

title: Range
description: Range validation  will check that the entered value is in the specified range.

title: Required
description: Required validation  will check that the user has entered the value in the property or not.

title: Rule
description: Rule validationwill allow the user to set custom rules on a particular field.

title: StartsWith
description: startsWith validation  allows user to enter the input which starts with particular value.

title: Time
description: time validation  will allow user to enter the input only in the correct time format.

title: Unique
description: Unique validationis used to validate unique input based on formArray.

title: UpperCase
description: UpperCase validation decorator will allow user to enter the alphabets only in the upperCase format.

title: Url
description: Url validation  will check that value entered in the property is in the correct url format or not.

title: blacklist
description: Remove the characters form the user entered value.

title: escape
description: escapes the string when the user enters the input.

title: ltrim
description: Trim characters from the left-side of the input.

title: Prefix
description: Allows you to add prefix to the input.

title: rtrim
description: Trim characters from the right-side of the input.

title: Custom
description: Allows you to set condition in custom property of the sanitizer.

title: stripLow
description: Remove the characters with a numerical value < 32 and 127.

title: Suffix
description: Allows you to add suffix to the input.

title: toBoolean
description: Convert the input to a boolean.

title: toDate
description: Convert the input to a date, or null if the input is not a date.

title: toDouble
description: Convert the input to a float, or NAN if the input is not a float.

title: toFloat
description: Convert the input to a float, or NAN if the input is not a float.

title: toInt
description: Convert the input to an integer, or NAN if the input is not an integer.

title: toString
description: Convert the input to a string.

title: trim
description: Trim characters from the input.

title: whitelist
description: Remove characters that do not appear in the whitelist.
